snippet: Conservative Costa Rican lawmakers may have accidentally approved language making same-sex unions legal when they passed a piece of legislation this week.
abstract: Conservative Costa Rican lawmakers accidentally approve bill making same-sex unions legal; did not notice that final version of the bill had changed earlier language that defined marriage as a union between a man and a woman.
lead_paragraph: Conservative Costa Rican lawmakers may have accidentally approved language making same-sex unions legal when they passed a piece of legislation this week.

headline.main: Costa Rica: Gay Union Bill Slips By
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica: Gay Union Bill Slips By

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
